items.sentence: Tom told me that he thought that he might be able to do that.
I suspect Tom knows that Mary doesn't live in Boston anymore.
I suspect Tom and Mary were planning on doing that yesterday.
I suspect Tom and Mary want us to help them do that tomorrow.
I suspect that Tom won't tell Mary why he's going to do that.
I suspect that Tom is likely to do that while he's in Boston.
I suspect that Tom and Mary don't speak French to each other.
I suspect that Tom and Mary aren't going to do that together.
I suspect that Tom and Mary aren't able to do that very well.
I don't think that anybody really thought that Tom was happy.
I don't think that Tom had anything to do with what happened.
I think there's a good chance that we'll never see Tom again.
I don't think Tom knows what time Mary wants him to meet her.
I don't think that Tom is going to go to Australia with Mary.
I don't think that you'll be able to persuade Tom to do that.
I don't think that Tom would try to do that without our help.
I don't think that Tom would mind showing you how to do that.
I told Tom that it would be better if he didn't get involved.
Tom told Mary that you'd finished the work three days before.
If you have to say that you're smart, are you actually smart?
Tom is still here, but the rest of the team has already left.
It was the most frightening experience that Tom had ever had.
There are still many things we don't know about the universe.
Several members of the rescue team died trying to rescue Tom.
Tom isn't good at drawing, but he's a very good photographer.
Tom is mad at Mary because of what she said about his family.
Don't you have anything better to do than read this nonsense?
I wasn't born in Boston, but I've lived here most of my life.
Mary is in love with a handsome boy from her class named Tom.
I doubt that the delay will be as long as you think it'll be.
I was surprised to find out that Tom could play the trombone.
When was the last time you walked more than three kilometers?
Would you rather work for a large company or a small company?
Mary\'s closets are full of clothes she hasn\'t worn in years.
I suspect Tom won\'t tell Mary what happened to him yesterday.
It wasn\'t as difficult to do as I thought it was going to be.
It\'ll take me at least three hours to do my homework tonight.
Mary is the most beautiful girl I\'ve ever actually talked to.
I can\'t imagine how Tom has put up with Mary all these years.
I can\'t imagine what my life would be like without my family.
I can\'t stand it here any longer. I need a change of scenery.
I can\'t tell you his name, but I can tell you where he lives.
When I opened the door, Tom was standing there wearing a suit.
When you breathe out in cold weather, you can see your breath.
I really appreciate your offer to help me clean out my garage.

My favorite subjects in high school were geometry and history.

Tom finished eating all the ice cream that was in the freezer.
